detail_desc: Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Four pairs of knee highs. 20 denier.

Set with a T-shirt, shorts and cap in soft organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif and press-studs at the shoulders. Shorts with ribbing and a decorative tie at the waist. Jersey-lined cap with a print motif on the front and elastication at the back.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short velvet dress with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud. 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long, hand-made earrings in resin, metal and plastic. Length 10.5 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button and back pockets.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long, wide puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Top in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with ribbed trims.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the top, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases and satin stripes down the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Turban in a double layer of soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Slightly shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in Sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirts in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Small embroidery detail on the chest, and a gently rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed finish.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in narrow-wale, patterned cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and back pockets.
Thong briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Imitation suede sandals with straps that tie around the ankles and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pyjama top and shorts in printed cotton-blend jersey. Round-necked vest top and short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high stand-up collar and zip with a plastic pearly bead tab. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Bikini with a print motif and glittery details. Top with a lined front and narrow shoulder straps. Bottoms with a wide flounce at the top and a lined gusset.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with an embroidered pattern. Ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh panels on the legs, wide elastication at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Drawstring at the sides to create a draped effect.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Lined.
Cropped sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an elastic racer back and deep armholes.
Long, V-neck dress in jersey with long sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs and a chest pocket. Seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (size 1-2Y without press-studs), and elasticated hems.

Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, stretch cotton denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, fake fly and zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with press-studs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.

Cotton canvas shoulder bag with two handles, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Two side compartments and two large outer compartments, one with a zip and one with a press-stud. One zipped inner compartment and a padded laptop compartment. Lined. Size 15x30x42 cm.
Body in soft, airy ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Fleece-lined jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a zipped chest pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Large metal earrings with wooden pendants. Length 10.5 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.

Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with decorative appliqués. Opening with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Cowl-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Calf-length skirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and a high waist with covered elastication at the back. Unlined.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a gathered neckline and V-shaped opening at the top with narrow ties. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow covered elastication at the cuffs, and gathered tiers at the hips and knees for added width. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and narrow, adjustable, frill-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset lace detail and a flared skirt. Lined.
Non-padded, underwired bra in lace and mesh with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam and covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, sewn-on decorative bow at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 2 cm.
Warm-lined ankle boots with pointed toes and block heels. Soft faux fur linings and insoles. Platform 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
